title: Three Monstrous Trolls (3C114)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Tale. Plays to your support area. Response: If a Shadow card is about to add any number of twilight tokens, exert a Hobbit ally to prevent this.
Lore:	”'Great big nasty twenty foot high smelly things _- and they're arguing… arguing about how they were going to cook us!'”
Rarity:	C
